channel.title: html on Teach Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in html on Teach Data Science

item.title: Counting commits and peer code review
item.description: Today’s guest entry by Amelia McNamara (University of St. Thomas) describes a creative way that she tackled a problem in one of her upper level courses. One note: The JSM is underway. Looking for interesting talks? Mine’s excellent Shiny for JSM 2019 app for those of you in Denver. This past semester, I taught two sections of a course called Advanced Statistical Software (yes, I’m aware of the acronym. We’re changing the course title soon…).
